overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active social media presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a total of 3,580 followers. His posts consistently engage audiences with topics related to social media analysis, coordinated behavior, and academic opportunities, generating significant likes and interactions, particularly on LinkedIn.
